title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5903.4 - Proposals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5903.4 - Proposals

State Regulations
(a) A proposal for
grant awards under the Research and Development Grants Program shall be filed
with the executive director of the foundation according to schedules, guidelines and criteria established by and provided by the executive director
for the submission of proposals. (b) The proposal shall conform to the foundation's Guidelines for Preparation of

Final Proposals, which shall be supplied to the applicant upon the approval of
a preliminary proposal as provided in section
5903.3
(e) of this

Part. (c) The proposal must be
complete, in proper form and verified by the applicant and responsible
administrative and fiscal designates, where required, at the institution with
which the applicant is affiliated. (d) The executive director shall notify the
applicant in writing of the receipt of the proposal. The executive director
shall also notify the applicant if the proposal is found to be
incomplete. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5903.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
